name: DEMIGOD NFT Gallery
description:
DEMIGOD™ NFT Gallery is a ever-changing Digital gallery space displaying NFT works form artists across the world in unique interactive ways. Explore the gallery space interact with the art pieces and have the opportunity to purchase them directly through the websites they were minted on.

Re-experience NFT art in a virtual gallery and explore new creators and share in the joint experience.

This high Fidelity experience will bring you closer to art pieces then traditional gallery spaces and crates a grounded non-browser-based connection with art pieces.
